DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect video-supported group-based Otago exercise programme intervention balance , mobility , physical performance aerobic endurance community-dwelling older adult 65+ year old .
DOC.brief_title: Video-supported Group-based Otago Exercise Programme Physical Performance Older Adults .
DOC.criteria: Aged 65 year old . Living community ( Valencia , Spain ) . Able ambulate independently without walk aid . Have severe medical contraindication physical activity . Able communicate . Have selfreported visual auditory capacity follow command . Provide sign informed consent . Unable ambulate independently . Minimental state examination score < 24 . Barthel Index score < 80 . Severe visual auditory disability . Unstable cardiovascular disease . Neurological disorder could compromise exercise . Upper low extremity fracture past year .
